attributes.action: announce, on television, the termination of the game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rule 1: you are playing the game
Rule 2: whenever you think about the game, you lose
Rule 3: loss must be announced.

The game will only end when the British Prime Minister announces its termination.

The game is a tedious drain upon time and resources, and this country would undoubtedly be far better off without its seditious influences.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
